subject: Re: [EVP-ITC] Re: skeptic: My response on Wiltshire Group site

full_text:

Me Too, I thought in this field how can there be experts.  You never stop learning in this field, so to me that means their can never be an expert. If you don't stop learning about the field there can't be an expert.
   
  William

purplespacefriend <purplealiengirl@...> wrote:
          Crap, I forgot, this is still Steve and Bruce's group, they are the 
real EVP experts, just ask, they'll tell ya. I mean, geeze, Steve has 
what, six months experience?

There is always these little clowns that want to show off to the 
world, and claim they are to only experts.

I've had enough!

F-S

--- In EVP-ITC@yahoogroups.com, "Steve Hultay" <urkel23@...> wrote:
>
> 
> Sorry you found another reason to complain frank, but some people 
like 
> to hear others research and what they are getting. I know that 
shot as 
> well as many of your other e-mails are directed at me because your 
an 
> angry bitter person, you may have noticed that i do not say 
anything 
> bad about you. Why would 2 wrongs make a right? I seem to post some 
> stuff from all different methods, maybe one will click and move us 
to a 
> better level of communication. There are other things than the 
frank's 
> box, is that why your mad?
> 
> -Steve
> 
> 
> 
> --- In EVP-ITC@yahoogroups.com, "purplespacefriend"

keep

hundred 
> > recordings. It seems like just a bunch of showing off. "I just 
posted 
> > the latest....blah-blah-blah-blah" Who gives a crap? 
> > 
> > Yeah, negative, maybe. 
> > 
> > 
> > Frank-S
